p: The dN/dS ratio was calculated through the Datamonkey webserver [ 19], using the fixed effects likelihood (FEL) and fast unconstrained Bayesian approximation (FUBAR) package [ 20, 21]; sufficient diversity for the analysis was present only in the nucleoprotein (N) and large polymerase protein (L) genes of both B3 and D8 genotypes and for H in the D8 genotype.
